channel.title: CVE Feed for Weintek -- cMT-FHD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Weintek -- cMT-FHD

item.title: CVE-2023-40145|2024-08-02T18:24:55.542Z -- weintek -- cmt-fhd
item.description: In Weintek's cMT3000 HMI Web CGI device, an anonymous attacker can execute arbitrary commands after login to the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-38584|2024-08-02T17:46:56.458Z -- weintek -- cmt-fhd
item.description: In Weintek's cMT3000 HMI Web CGI device, the cgi-bin command_wb.cgi contains a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an anonymous attacker to hijack control flow and bypass login authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-43492|2024-08-02T19:44:43.206Z -- weintek -- cmt-fhd
item.description: In Weintek's cMT3000 HMI Web CGI device, the cgi-bin codesys.cgi contains a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an anonymous attacker to hijack control flow and bypass login authentication.
